attributes.action: UK schools should break up for summer holidays start of July instead of end July
attributes.additional_details: Tickets to travel in end of July or start of August are so expensive! Can't afford it, like some parents who work 24/7 and have to leave their kids elsewhere and pay as school have half terms.
attributes.background:
I find it very unfair that our children break up for summer holiday at the end of July. Other countries break up Mid June.
-let's have less half terms as we work and no where to go!
-let's break up before so our kids can have a better holiday where tickets don't cost an eye of your head!

rejection.details:
The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils.

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245565
